1.0.name: wordpress/aspen-extras
1.0.description:
This plugin provides several enhancements for the Aspen WordPress theme.

Add-on Themes

This plugin also allows you to upload and install new, add-on subthemes. There are free add-on subthemes available at http://aspentheme.com.

Theme Updating

Normally, you will be able to update your version of the Aspen theme directly from WordPress.org. But sometimes there is a considerable delay between the time a new version of the theme is submitted to WordPress.org, and when it becomes available there. This option lets you easily update Aspen after downloading it from the Aspen website.

Per Page Theme Switching

You can save your subthemes in the WordPress database. This allows Per Page Theme setting by specifying 'aspen_per_page_theme' as a Custom Field.
